analysis.description:
BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#203) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#205-207)

Reentrancy in OpiriaCrowdsale._processPurchase (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#856-865):
	External calls:
	- _deliverTokens(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#860-861)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- soldTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#862-865)

Reentrancy in OpiriaCrowdsale.distributeBonus (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#923-939):
	External calls:
	- _deliverTokens(addresses[i],bonusAmount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#933)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bonusOf (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#936)

Reentrancy in OpiriaCrowdsale.sendTokensTo (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#905-915):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(MintableToken(token).mint(to,amount)) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#910)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- soldTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#911)

Reentrancy in OpiriaCrowdsale.withdrawBonus (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#942-952):
	External calls:
	- _deliverTokens(msg.sender,bonusOf[msg.sender]) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#946-947)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bonusOf (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#948-949)

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#359-362) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#361-362)

OpiriaCrowdsale.distributeBonus (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#923-939) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MintableToken(token).finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#938-939)

OpiriaCrowdsale.withdrawBonus (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#942-952) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MintableToken(token).finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#950-952)

OpiriaCrowdsale.claimReservedTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#971-992) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MintableToken(token).finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol)

Reentrancy in OpiriaCrowdsale.distributeBonus (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#923-939):
	External calls:
	- _deliverTokens(addresses[i],bonusAmount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#933)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBonus (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#935-936)

Reentrancy in OpiriaCrowdsale.unlockTokenTransfers (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#916-923):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(PausableToken(token).paused()) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#920)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bonusUnlockTime (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#920-921)

Reentrancy in OpiriaCrowdsale.withdrawBonus (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#942-952):
	External calls:
	- _deliverTokens(msg.sender,bonusOf[msg.sender]) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#946-947)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBonus (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#947-948)

TimedCrowdsale.TimedCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#566-575) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#572-573)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#583-589) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/8/0x4ef6ea200f5b5fe49421c03cb7690abedca5d685.sol#589)
